Key:
(She's eating politely, and she hasn't fought
with Origami since she started... Could it be that
I messed up the food, gluing her mouth together?)
W-Well... Did I mess up the bento somehow?

Hm? No, that isn't so. The spiciness of this
burdock root is perfect.
I see... As long as that's the case.

(Hmmm... She didn't look like she was lying.
Oh, I gave some of my bento to Origami too,
so if I can see how she's doing...)

The food that Shido made... I'll have to memorize
its smell...

A-Are you all right?! Was my
bento not to your tastes?
Hehe... Something's a little different today.
R-Right? You think so too, right Rinne?

Shido, girls are more complex than you think.
You have to pay attention to them more carefully.
That sort of thing is really important, you know?
Er, ah, right... Wait, what do you mean?
